actions.name: Content

cost.trigger: The end of an Activation where the user did not use a Physical-or Special-Category Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The end of an Activation where the user did not use a Physical-or Special-Category Attack.

Effect: The user heals two Ticks of HP.
